We manage our sustainability matters through our Corporate Responsibility (CR) Policy that identifies four strategic areas where we aim to continue driving our efforts in creating positive 
change, while minimizing negative impacts. 
•Governance: Maintain transparency in sustainability governance and communication with key stakeholders
•Environment: Manage the impact of our operations on our environment
•Economic: Provide innovative interconnect solutions to enable a smart future
